SataPCIeComboPort7.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 18 or SATA Port 5. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H Platform Controller Hub EDS. Note: For unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes, Flex I/O Lanes that can be configured as PCIe* or SATA, the lanes must be statically assigned to SATA or PCIe*. These unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes must not be assigned as polarity based.

SataPCIeComboPort8.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 8
SataPCIeComboPort8.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 19 or SATA Port 6. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H LP Platform Controller Hub EDS. Workstation / Sever Only. Note: For unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes, Flex I/O Lanes that can be configured as PCIe* or SATA, the lanes must be statically assigned to SATA or PCIe*. These unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes must not be assigned as polarity based.

SataPCIeComboPort9.label: SATA / PCIe Combo Port 9
SataPCIeComboPort9.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 20 or SATA Port 7. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H LP Platform Controller Hub EDS. Workstation / Sever Only. Note: For unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes, Flex I/O Lanes that can be configured as PCIe* or SATA, the lanes must be statically assigned to SATA or PCIe*. These unused SATA/PCIe* Combo Lanes must not be assigned as polarity based.

USB3PCIeComboPort0.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 0
USB3PCIeComboPort0.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 1 or USB3 Port 7. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

USB3PCIeComboPort1.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 1
USB3PCIeComboPort1.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 2 or USB3 Port 8. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

USB3PCIeComboPort2.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 2
USB3PCIeComboPort2.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 3 or USB3 Port 9. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

USB3PCIeComboPort3.label: USB3 / PCIe Combo Port 3
USB3PCIeComboPort3.help_text: This setting configures the PCIe port to operate as either PCIe Port 4 or USB3 Port 10. For further details on Flex I/O see Comet Lake-H Platform Controller Hub EDS.

PCIeSecGen3PllEnable.label: Secondary Gen3 PLL Enabled
PCIeSecGen3PllEnable.help_text: This setting determines which Gen3 PLL source clock PCIe Controller 6 (Port 21-24) will use. Note: When the Secondary Gen3 PLL option is disabled PCIe Controller 6 (Port 21-24) will use Primary Gen3 PLL as the source clock.

TouchResetGpio.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Reset GPIO Select
TouchResetGpio.help_text: Configure Intel(R) Precise Touch Technology Reset GPIO

TouchIntGpio.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Interrupt GPIO Select
TouchIntGpio.help_text: Configure Intel(R) Precise Touch Technology Interrupt GPIO

IntegratedTouchConfiguration.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Configuration

TouchEnabled.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Enabled

IntelPreciseTouchAndStylusConfiguration.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Configuration

Touch1MaxFreq.label: Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus Controller 1 Maximum Frequency
Touch1MaxFreq.help_text: This setting allows customers to set an upper limit on the frequency for Intel(R) Precise Touch and Stylus transactions for the Touch Controller 1 interface.

TchSprdSpecClkEn.label: Touch Spread Spectrum Clock Enabled
TchSprdSpecClkEn.help_text: This setting enables the use of the spread spectrum clock source when generating the SPI_CLK for Touch.

InputFile.label: ME Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the Embedded Controller binary that will be merged into the FWUpdate image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

InputFile.label: PMC Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the PMC binary that will be merged into the FWUpdate image.

Enabled.label: OEM KM
Enabled.help_text: This setting Enables / Disables OEM KM in the FWUpdate image.

InputFile.label: OEM Key Manifest Binary File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the OEM Key manifest binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.

InputFile.label: PCH Configuration File
InputFile.help_text: This loads the PCH Configuration binary merged into the output image generated by the Intel(R) FIT tool.
